This game has been around for ages, but it hasn't aged too much to gain new fans.  Portal is a classic puzzle game with an interesting premise.  It challenges your thinking at every level, and captivates your interest to the end!

There's never been a game like Portal. Fun, original, funny and a twisted at the end. If you buy this game, make sure you get Portal 2 also. Truly fun and amazing games.

It's Portal. You bend the laws of space and physics to traverse puzzles while a cruelly-sarcastic AI riffs on the whole experience. And it's brilliant. While it may not have the story depth of its sequel, it still is a incredibly well-paced and iconic gaming experience.
The best game of this generation and possibly of all time. Great story, and many easter eggs and references. Graphics are really good for the age of the game.

Great game! Even the credits music is well worth the money! 

Portal is a one-of-a-kind game. Unusually for a puzzle game of this period, Portal is very atmospheric. The only form of interaction you have with an NPC in the game is the ever-present AI who makes humorous, yet macabre comments. In the interests of not spoiling it, I won't elaborate, but experiencing this, and the loose plotline that unfolds as you go through the testing chambers is something I truly believe that everyone should experience.

 The music perfectly fits the game, changing depending on your location. I had chills multiple times, and finding out the truth through secrets as you go is unparalleled.

Portal has left a huge legacy in popular culture, with the "The cake is a lie" phrase being repeated throughout the Internet, and this game set the standard for puzzle games.
Great game. More easy now than in my childhood.

Unique portal mechanic and clever puzzles make Portal a classic that's worth checking out. However it's a little too short to justify the full price, so get it while on sale, which happens fairly often with this game.

Absolute 10/10. So simple, unique & beautifully crafted all in one. A great campaign & some fun bonus challenges make it a gamer's bucketlist experience!

The puzzles are pretty much a joke, and the only time I've had to stop and think in the game is when I make routes for the challenge mode. The step challenge still stumps me and I need to find out how I'm to approach it. Overall it's a nice story, vibe, and experience and I've enjoyed every bit of it. Though I wish they polished the portal physics a bit more
wery good geim

Es un juego curioso, te hace pensar bastante. Aunque los puzzles no son muy complicados, según avanzas se van haciendo más complejos. Por menos de un Euro, Totalmente recomendable. Lo único malo que no he conseguido poner el audio en castellano y he tenido que jugar con subtítulos. A mi me ha durado unas 5 horas. Saludos y a por el pastel ;). PD.: No os perdáis la canción del final de la máquina, no tiene desperdicio.
Portal é um jogo relativamente curto e rápido de jogar, porém vale a pena. Junto com Portal 2 (já mais elaborado após o sucesso do primeiro) figuram como uma das melhores franquias que já joguei.

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
Still Alive!
